mapper.select: SELECT s.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, s.create_company_id as createCompanyId, s.create_company_name as createCompanyName, s.create_date as createDate, s.create_org_id as createOrgId, s.create_org_name as createOrgName, s.create_person_id as createPersonId, s.create_person_name as createPersonName, s.current_serial as currentSerial, s.delflag as delflag, s.id as id , s.ruler_id as rulerId, s.update_date as updateDate, s.update_person_id as updatePersonId, s.update_person_name as updatePersonName from pt_sys_num_ruler_sub s where s.ruler_id=#{roleId} ORDER BY s.create_date DESC LIMIT 1
